subject: Re: [cc-devel] wpLicense 0.7.6 Available
body:
Nathan,

Oops, yes I meant mozCC. Good to hear it supports Songbird and I'll give 
  both a try.

Thanks,

grtz
BjornW


> Burobjorn wrote:
>> Hi Nathan,
>>
>> Out of curiosity: Is Songbird also supported with wplicense?
> 
> Are you confusing wplicense with MozCC 
> (http://wiki.creativecommons.org/MozCC)?  wpLicense is a plugin for 
> WordPress (http://wordpress.org), the open source blogging package. 
> MozCC does support Songbird in recent releases.
> 
> Nathan
> 
> 
>>
>> grtz
>> BjornW
>> _______________________________________________
>> cc-devel mailing list
>> cc-devel@lists.ibiblio.org
>> http://lists.ibiblio.org/mailman/listinfo/cc-devel
>
